comments.author: Michael Becke
comments.body:
Hi Gary,

Thanks for the bug report.  Attached shortly are two patches that should solve this problem.  Though 
we highly discourage the use of the System property for configuring preemptive authentication, there is 
no reason to break the API in this release.

Mike

comments.author: ggregory@seagullsw.com
comments.body:
Mike: 

Thank you for the update. Will these changes make it back into CVS?

Gary

comments.author: Michael Becke
comments.body:
Yep, I'll apply the patches tomorrow night unless there are objections.

Mike

comments.author: Michael Becke
comments.body:
Patch applied to 2.0 and HEAD.

Mike

description:
Our code no longer compiles as HttpState#PREEMPTIVE_PROPERTY has been removed.
Our code compiles with 2.0.1.

See: 
http://jakarta.apache.org/commons/httpclient/apidocs/org/apache/commons/httpclient/HttpState.html#PREEMPTIVE_PROPERTY
